info.title: Redmine API - IXA Colombia Enhanced
info.description: Comprehensive Redmine REST API for project management, issue tracking, and collaboration. This enhanced schema includes all major endpoints for complete CRUD operations across all Redmine resources, optimized for GPT interactions with inline schemas and detailed documentation. Includes IXA Colombia specific customizations and workflows.

tags.name: Issues
tags.description: Complete issue management including creation, updates, status changes, assignments, and bulk operations. Supports custom fields, watchers, and attachments.

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: Full project lifecycle management including creation, configuration, membership management, and archival. Supports hierarchical projects and module management.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Complete user management including registration, profile updates, role assignments, group memberships, and authentication settings.

tags.name: Time Tracking
tags.description: Comprehensive time entry management for project tracking, billing, and reporting. Supports activity types, comments, and custom fields.

tags.name: Attachments
tags.description: File attachment handling including upload, download, metadata management, and association with various resources.

tags.name: Wiki
tags.description: Wiki page management including creation, editing, versioning, and page hierarchy. Supports attachments and cross-references.

tags.name: Versions
tags.description: Project version and milestone management including creation, status tracking, issue assignments, and release planning.

tags.name: Groups
tags.description: User group management for organizing teams, assigning permissions, and managing project access at scale.

tags.name: Roles
tags.description: Role and permission management for controlling user access to projects, issues, and administrative functions.

tags.name: Memberships
tags.description: Project membership management including user assignments, role modifications, and team organization.

tags.name: Custom Fields
tags.description: Custom field configuration and management for extending Redmine functionality across all resource types.

tags.name: Enumerations
tags.description: System enumeration management including time entry activities, issue priorities, and document categories.

tags.name: News
tags.description: Project news and announcements management for keeping stakeholders informed about project updates.

tags.name: Forums
tags.description: Discussion forum management for project collaboration and community engagement.

tags.name: Documents
tags.description: Document management including categorization, versioning, and access control for project documentation.

tags.name: Files
tags.description: File repository management for storing and organizing project files with version control.

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Advanced search capabilities across all Redmine content including issues, projects, wiki pages, and documents.

tags.name: Queries
tags.description: Saved query management for creating, sharing, and executing complex searches and filters.

tags.name: Configuration
tags.description: System configuration access including trackers, issue statuses, priorities, and global settings.

tags.name: IXA Extensions
tags.description: IXA Colombia specific extensions including custom workflows, fields, and integrations for enhanced project management.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Column to sort with. Append :desc to invert the order.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Get issues from the project with the given id

parameters.name: subproject_id
parameters.description: Get issues from subprojects (!any for all, none for none)

parameters.name: tracker_id
parameters.description: Get issues from the tracker with the given id

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: Get issues with the given status id or status name

parameters.name: assigned_to_id
parameters.description: Get issues which are assigned to the given user id or 'me'

parameters.name: author_id
parameters.description: Get issues created by the given user id

parameters.name: priority_id
parameters.description: Get issues with the given priority id

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Get issues with the given category id

parameters.name: fixed_version_id
parameters.description: Get issues with the given target version id

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Get issues whose subject contains the given string

parameters.name: created_on
parameters.description: Get issues created on the given date or date range

parameters.name: updated_on
parameters.description: Get issues updated on the given date or date range

parameters.name: cf_x
parameters.description: Get issues with the given value for custom field with id 'x'

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Get only users with the given status (0=anonymous, 1=active, 2=registered, 3=locked)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter users on their login, firstname, lastname and mail (case insensitive)

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Get only users who are members of the given group

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID or 'current' for authenticated user

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID or 'me' for current user

get.summary: Get all wiki pages for project

parameters.name: all_words
parameters.description: Search for all words (AND) vs any word (OR)
